channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 06:04 Driven the alarm to the Donetsk region. Stop by further messages.
item.description: 🟢 06:04 Driven the alarm to the Donetsk region. Stop by further messages.#Donetsk_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 06:04 PM Alarm to Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community-mirorsk territorial community-Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community
